head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: saxon:string-to-hexBinary()

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: saxon:string-to-hexBinary()

p.b: saxon:string-to-hexBinary($in as xs:string, $encoding as xs:string) ==> xs:hexBinary

body.p: This function takes as input a string and the name of a character encoding (for example "UTF8"). It encodes the contents of the string value as a sequence of bytes using a particular encoding, and returns the xs:hexBinary representation of this sequence of bytes.
